issue.title: [CF 356] Allow icons to be dragged
issue.body:
to any slot in a 1 square perimeter around an icon.

e.g. in a 2x4 group with icons X

X X X X
X X X X

let icons to be dragged to any slot X or O

OOOOOO
OX X X XO
OX X X XO
OOOOOO


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #356 | Raw

comments.body:
Note: This could be VERY tricky to implement. Don't plan on this happening for sure.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

This is in mid-implementation as of the latest alpha. Ignore all the extra icons that appear when dragging.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
